doctor.name: Dr. M S Alam (Utsha)
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), FCPS ( Gastroenterology, Thesis), CCD (BIRDEM), EDC (BIRDEM), C-CARD
doctor.specialty: Medicine, Gastroliver, Rheumatology, Hormone & Diabetes Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. M S Alam (Utsha) is a highly qualified and versatile medicine, gastroliver, rheumatology, hormone, and diabetes specialist in Dhaka. He holds an MBBS, dual FCPS in Medicine and Gastroenterology, and multiple advanced certifications including CCD, EDC, and C-CARD from BIRDEM. He is also an EULAR Fellow in Rheumatology and has completed a prestigious fellowship in Gastroenterology from Hyderabad, India. Currently serving as a Senior Consultant in Medicine at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, Dr. Alam is experienced in treating a wide range of conditions such as liver diseases, IBS, ulcers, arthritis, gout, hormonal imbalances, thyroid disorders, diabetes, and autoimmune diseases. His patient-centric approach and multi-disciplinary expertise make him a trusted physician for complex chronic illnesses. He sees patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, Room 505, from 4:00 PM to 11:00 PM (closed on Mondays). For comprehensive and expert care in Dhaka, Dr. M S Alam (Utsha) is a reliable choice.

doctor.name: Dr. Tareen Ahmed
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Dr. Tareen Ahmed is a dedicated Endocrinology (Diabetes, Thyroid, and Hormonal Diseases) Specialist in Dhaka, with clinical expertise in managing a wide range of endocrine disorders including diabetes, thyroid dysfunction, obesity, metabolic syndrome, hormonal imbalances, and adrenal and pituitary gland issues. She completed her MBBS and holds a DEM (Diploma in Endocrinology & Metabolism), currently serving as an Additional Coordinator (DPL) at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College, a renowned institution for endocrine care in Bangladesh. Dr. Tareen Ahmed is known for providing patient-centered, evidence-based care with a special focus on diabetes management and lifestyle-related hormonal problems. She sees patients at the BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Shahbag, Dhaka, from 3pm to 5pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday)

doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Faruque Pathan is a highly experienced endocrinology specialist in Dhaka, with an MBBS from Dhaka and an MD in Endocrinology & Metabolism. He currently serves as the Director of the Academy and Senior Consultant in the Department of Endocrinology at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Pathan specializes in the management of diabetes, thyroid disorders, hormonal imbalances, obesity, adrenal gland diseases, pituitary disorders, and metabolic bone diseases.
